QuestData.Title: An Alternative Alternative
QuestData.Description: The girl is too far gone for mere ointments to be effective. There may be another way...$B$BThe forest of Azuremyst holds many secrets, one of those being a rare plant known as the azure snapdragon that some claim to be a panacea - a cure all.$B$BYou can identify the plant by its stark contrast to the other plants of Azuremyst and its need to grow at the base of the azure pine trees. Make haste!$B$BAnd $n, be wary of the root threshers of the region as they consume snapdragon for sustenance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Daedal at Azure Watch wants you to bring him 5 Azure Snapdragon Bulbs.
QuestData.RewardText: Watch as the plant works its magic.
